H0.text: who won the men 's single title of australia open on 1 february 2015. Roger Federer

H1.text: who won the men 's single title of australia open on 1 february 2015. Rafael Nadal

H2.text: who won the men 's single title of australia open on 1 february 2015. Andy Murray

H3.text: who won the men 's single title of australia open on 1 february 2015. Djokovic

A4.text: Novak Djokovic defeated Andy Murray in the final, 7–6(7–5), 6–7(4–7), 6–3, 6–0 to win the men's singles tennis title at the 2015 Australian Open.

A5.text: It was also Murray's fourth runner-up finish at the event, the most in the Open Era.
